summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 4.0 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 281 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1862 m), feels like temperature (up 2.5°C), outside temperature (up 2.7°C), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, humidity should not be a concern and near calm conditions. Light to moderate rain is forecast, occasional overcast conditions, and it’s dim outside. Weather could become unsettled.
